text: Bengt Sigvard Jonsson, born 27 February 1923 in Bodum, Sweden, dead 17 September 1969 at the same place, was a Swedish cross-country skier and lumberjack. He represented Rossöns IK at club level. He won Vasaloppet in 1956. He died in a drowning accident. == References == Category:1923 births Category:1969 deaths Category:Deaths by drowning Category:Swedish male cross- country skiers Category:Vasaloppet winners
title: Sigvard Jonsson
